result.execSummary:
The defendant Kevin L Mathison was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Failure to Report to Jail, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.425(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes:
Deferred Agreement - 1 year
Enter plea of no contest - upon successfuly completion - dismiss
Remain subject to the terms and conditions of bond
The defendant shall not engage in any conduct which would lead an impartial magistrate to find probable cause exists to believe that the defendant has committed a violation of the criminal laws of the United States or the State of Wisconsin or of any ordinances adopting the same.

Granted release privileges under 303.08(1).
Defendant may serve in Oneida County.
Defendant entitled to earn good time per 973.09(1)(d) as calculated per 302.43.
